Title: The Forging of Memories
Description:
Before its shutdown, we earthen would descend to the Awakening Machine below and renew our cycle. But now, even if it was still working, I would see my cycle broken and be remembered as I am.

<Korgran lets out a deep sigh.>

These hands look strong, but they become heavier with each passing moment. The stiffness in my wrists and elbows will not let me carry the items to the forge.

Please, add the right material to the forge as I call them out.
CompletionText: Oh, I almost forget. I did ask you to help with forging the lantern, didn't I?
RewardText:
Is it... hm, It looks like... I can't remember.

But this lantern is absolutely magnificent!

Objectives.Text: Speak with Korgran to start forging the lantern
